metadata.title: USN-5817-1 -- Setuptools vulnerability
metadata.description: Sebastian Chnelik discovered that setuptools incorrectly handled certain regex inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5817-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-setuptools - 3.3-1ubuntu2+esm1 python-setuptools-doc - 3.3-1ubuntu2+esm1 python3-pkg-resources - 3.3-1ubuntu2+esm1 python-setuptools-whl - 3.3-1ubuntu2+esm1 python-pkg-resources - 3.3-1ubuntu2+esm1 python3-setuptools - 3.3-1ubuntu2+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
